amendment.description: To require the use of iron, steel, and manufactured goods produced in the United States in the construction of the Keystone XL Pipeline and facilities.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 17 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 46. Record Vote Number: 5.

Amendment SA 17 proposed by Senator Cantwell for Senator Franken to Amendment SA 2. (consideration: CR S189-190; text: CR S189) To require the use of iron, steel, and manufactured goods produced in the United States in the construction of the Keystone XL Pipeline and facilities.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 17 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 46. Record Vote Number: 5.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 17 proposed by Senator Cantwell for Senator Franken to Amendment SA 2.
